context.chunk-005: Terminologiesâ€¢Image Classification: Predict the type or class of an object in an image.â€¢Input: An image with a single object, such as a photograph.â€¢Output: A class labelâ€¢Object Localization: Locate the presence of objects in an image and indicate their location with a bounding box.â€¢Input: An image
